column4: by the way, i have trouble with my laptop keyboard... which layout should i take? i have a toshiba 2450... of course generic pc 105 aint working properly
which keyboard layout does your tosh have ?
thats a standard not a layout
Full sized 85 keys with 12 function keys
thats posting me a link about your laptop and asking me to work it out
i dont understand what you want exactly
I want to know what keyboard layout your laptop has
